name: Organize My CPE
description: AI-powered CPE tracking software for CPAs and accountants. Upload certificates, auto-extract course data, and track compliance across all 51 US jurisdictions.
problemSolved: CPAs must track continuing education credits for license renewal, often across multiple states with different requirements. Manual spreadsheet tracking is error-prone and time-consuming.

features.name: AI Certificate Extraction
features.description: Upload PDF certificates and AI automatically extracts course name, credits, date, field of study, and provider

features.name: 51 Jurisdiction Support
features.description: Track CPE requirements for all 50 US states plus Washington DC, each with unique rules

features.name: Field of Study Tracking
features.description: Track credits by category: Ethics, A&A (Accounting & Auditing), Tax, Technical, Behavioral Ethics

features.name: Compliance Dashboard
features.description: Visual progress bars showing completion status for each state's requirements

features.name: State-Specific Exports
features.description: Generate CSV or XLSX reports formatted for specific state board requirements

features.name: Secure Storage
features.description: Bank-level AES-256 encryption for all uploaded certificates

cpeRequirementsInfo.overview: Most US states require CPAs to complete continuing education to maintain their license
